Faraway states several properties of $U_i$ on page 61. Prove:


\begin{align*}
E[U_i]&=0 \\
Var[U_i] &= \frac{1}{\phi V(\mu_i)} \\
-E[\frac{\partial U_i}{\partial \mu_i}] &= \frac{1}{\phi V(\mu_i)}
\end{align*}
